message.content:
{"id": "8142", 
"title": "Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects", 
"description": "When working with binary projects, I encountered an issue where the scoped type hierarchy is not available. I don't understand why.", 
"OB": "When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can you please explain what this message means?", 
"EB": "When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I am currently receiving the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. It is unclear to me what this message means.", 
"SR": "Include the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project. Additionally, provide a clear explanation of the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
